scripts.package:change: pnpm changeset && git stage ./.changeset/* && git commit --m "feat: changeset" && git push
scripts.package:canary: yarn changeset version --snapshot canary && pnpm --filter=!demo -r publish --access public && changeset canary && git tag --delete relay-sdk-demo@undefined && git push --follow-tags
scripts.package:release: pnpm run deploy && changeset version && pnpm --filter=!demo -r publish --access public && changeset tag && git tag --delete relay-sdk-demo@undefined && git push --follow-tags
